:orphan:

cumulative
**********

Specifies whether the data plotted with :ref:`nplot` and exported with :ref:`nexport` should
be cumulative.



Syntax
------

::

  cumulative = on
  cumulative = off

Default
-------

``off``

Description
-----------

``cumulative = on`` will make the postprocessing commands use cumulative values.

----

``cumulative = off`` will `not` make the postprocessing commands use cumulative values.
